basics.description: **Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ The [NXLog BSM](https://docs.nxlog.co/refman/current/im/bsm.html) macOS data connector uses Sun's Basic Security Module (BSM) Auditing API to read events directly from the kernel for capturing audit events on the macOS platform. This REST API connector can efficiently export macOS audit events to Microsoft Sentinel in real-time. **Data Connectors:** 1 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for NXLog BSM macOS. You can get NXLog BSM macOS custom log data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.
